instruction: Please provide information on the revenue proportion related to China across different industries.
output: Sure, we can also examine the revenue proportion related to China across different industries. Since 2006, the revenue of listed companies related to China in developed securities markets has more than doubled (see left graph). However, the overall figure of this index covers up the differences in different industry sectors. The revenue from China in industries related to global technology supply chains or consumer product sales is higher than the average level (see right graph).
